meta.passport_validity: 12 months beyond intended date of arrival
meta.min_funds_requirement: Salary must meet threshold (e.g., 32k/64k EUR for Critical Skills)

documents.title: Employment Permit
documents.description: Original Critical Skills or General Employment Permit issued by DETE.

documents.title: Employment Contract
documents.description: Signed contract detailing job description, salary, and duration.

documents.title: Qualifications
documents.description: Certified copies of degrees and diplomas relevant to the job.

documents.title: Medical Insurance
documents.description: Private medical insurance covering the period until you are enrolled in state services.

steps_flow.title: Secure Job Offer
steps_flow.description: Get a job offer from an Irish employer.

steps_flow.title: Apply for Permit
steps_flow.description: Employer (or you) applies for the Employment Permit from DETE (Dept of Enterprise, Trade and Employment).

steps_flow.title: Receive Permit
steps_flow.description: Wait for approval and receive the physical permit.

steps_flow.title: Apply for Visa
steps_flow.description: Apply for the 'D' Long Stay visa online (AVATS) and submit documents.

steps_flow.title: Travel & Register
steps_flow.description: Enter Ireland and register with Immigration (ISD) to get your IRP card.
